name: Garfield Smogbuster
description:
Pollution is ravaging New York! Take off with Garfield and his friends and set course for the different districts of the Big Apple. Disperse the clouds of pollution that are hovering over the city while dodging the buildings and enemies that cross your path.

Use your best flying and shooting skills to fight enemies and get the highest possible score!

- 8 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS: Garfield, John, Odie, Arlene, Harry, Squeak, Nermal and Liz!

- Choose your favourite vehicle!

- Avoid the obstacles and projectiles on your path!

- Shoot enemies and collect bonus points!

- Catch the special items to multiply your scores by 10!

- Compare scores with your Facebook friends!
